title: [Works]
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis
snippet: " this is a' very bonny ; but Alan Breck'll be a wee thing nearer to the gallows than he's caring for ; and Dod ! I think this is a grand place to be leaving."

title: [Works]
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis
snippet: Dod, I'm thinking it would be a kind of a divertisement to gang and see what he'll be after ! Forby that I could see your lassie then.

title: [Works]
author: Stevenson, Robert Louis
snippet: Dod, sir, I'm a lone man ! If I was to tak her in, its highly possible the hellicat would try and gar me marry her when he turned up."
